Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: Hypoxia in utero, caused by conditions such as inadequate placental function (often abruptio placentae), preeclamptic toxicity, prolapse of the umbilical cord, or complications from anesthetic administration.
